sources.title: Exit Speed | Full Action Thriller Movie | Lea Thompson
sources.description:
Exit Speed - On Christmas Eve, ten strangers board a bus traveling across Texas. Far out in the wilds they collide with a drug effected biker. Forced off the road by other members of the gang, the passengers take refuge in the hell hole of an abandoned scrap yard. They use improvised weapons and sheer guts to mount a defense against the murderous bikers but, as their numbers dwindle, they realize that their survival depends on doing the unthinkable. They must go on the offensive.
**This film is under license from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved**
2008
Stars: Desmond Harrington, Lea Thompson, Fred Ward, Julie Mond

metadata.Plot: On Christmas Eve, ten strangers board a bus traveling across Texas. Far out in the wilds they collide with a meth-addicted biker. Forced off the road by other members of the gang, the passengers take refuge in the hell hole of an abandoned scrap yard. They use improvised weapons and sheer guts to mount a defense against the murderous bikers but, as their numbers dwindle, they realize that their survival depends on doing the unthinkable. They must go on the offensive.
metadata.Actors: Desmond Harrington, Lea Thompson, Julie Mond
